parameter.name: ApplicationServices-Web.config Connection String
parameter.description: ApplicationServices Connection String used in web.config by the application to access the database.

parameter.name: CRMDb-Web.config Connection String
parameter.description: CRMDb Connection String used in web.config by the application to access the database.
parameter.defaultValue: Data Source=localhost;Initial Catalog=BCAUAT_MSCRM_SUN;Persist Security Info=True;User ID=ucup;Password=password123;

parameter.name: HistDb-Web.config Connection String
parameter.description: HistDb Connection String used in web.config by the application to access the database.
parameter.defaultValue: Data Source=10.20.201.139;Initial Catalog=hist_tran;Persist Security Info=True;User ID=sa;Password=bcabca;

parameter.name: ArchiveDb-Web.config Connection String
parameter.description: ArchiveDb Connection String used in web.config by the application to access the database.
parameter.defaultValue: Data Source=10.20.201.146;Initial Catalog=CRM_ARCHIVE;Persist Security Info=True;User ID=sa;Password=bca123!;
